item.description:
6TH ANNUAL BEER TASTING

WHERE: Julio's Liquors

WHEN: Sunday, June 1st
TIME: 1-4pm

COST: Free


This is an annual event. There will be more that 200 beers for the tasting. I'ts FREE!
Julio's also has a gourmet shop... whiskey club, and many other events throughout the year.
www.juliosliquors.com

PARTICIPATING BREWERIES: (more added everyday!)
AB Specialties, Abita, Allagash, Anchor, Atwater, Avery, Ayinger, Ballast Point, Bear Republic, Berkshire, Boulder, Cisco, Clipper City, Dogfish, Dupont, Duvel, Floreff, Founders, Great Divide, Greenflash, Gritty?s, Harpoon, Hoppin Frog, Jolly Pumpkin, Koningshoven, La Chouffe, Left Hand, Legacy, Leinenkugel?s, Liefmans, Lindeman?s, Longtrail, Lost Abbey, Magic Hat, Mayflower, Mike?s Lemonade, Mikkeller, Narragansett, Newport , North Coast , Ommegang, Opa-Opa, Orval, Otter Creek, Port Brewing, Sam Adams, Sam Smith, Schneider, Seadog, Sherwood, Shipyard, Sierra Nevada , Smuttynose, Southern Tier, Speakeasy, St. Bernardus, Starbrands, Stone, Stone Coast , Stoudt?s, The Tap, Traquair House, Unibroue, Victory, Wachusett, Weyerbacher, Woodchuck.
OTHER VENDORS:
Food provided by: The Horseshoe Pub, Boylan?s Soda, Dr. Gonzo,
Stonewall Kitchens, Rogue Cheese, Harpoon Soda, WooWee Hot Sauce


Anyone interested?


Anyone interested?


_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet right ourside the entrance @ 1pm. We will wait 10 minutes before going inside.
item.why: There will be more than 200 beers to taste. Also, food vendors
item.name: 6th ANNUAL SPRING BEER FESTIVAL @ Julio's
